description:
Tina has seen some cute monkeys on TV that will be on display in a nearby zoo, but as everyone else is busy only Kaoru is able to attend this "photo club excursion". Tina is amazed by the zoo`s attraction: "Animal Fantasy - a place to explore love" where Kaoru and Tina are separated and then each have to cross the "Jungle of Evil" on their own.
When Tina and Kaoru finally get to the railway station the heavy pours of rain have caused a landslide and all train lines are closed.
